attributes.action: Stop schools being closed unnecessarily over fears of coronavirus (Covid-19)
attributes.additional_details:
A petition is currently circulating asking for the government to close school to stop the spreading of corona virus (covid19) this puts thousands of family’s at risk all over the country. 

Families who rely on being able to go to work to provide for their children and pay their bills! 

Families with self employed parents who can not afford to take the time off work if the schools close.

Families who’s workplaces simply will not allow this time off,

Or families who will have to pay for childcare if this does happen putting them in an uncomfortable financial situation.
attributes.background: Do not close schools unless that school or someone within that school actually poses a risk of having or testing positive for corona virus and spreading it.
